Description: TASS: â—ï¸Mining and sale of digital currency will not be subject to VAT, follows from the law ğŸ“ƒ Putin signed a law on taxation of digital currency. The main thing:â–ªDigital currency is recognized as property;â–ªMining and sale of digital currency will not be subject to VAT;â–ªThe operator of the mining infrastructure will have to report to the tax authorities who uses its services to issue cryptocurrency. If such information is not transmitted on time, a fine of 40 thousand rubles will be imposed;â–ªIn terms of personal income tax payment, the digital currency obtained through mining will be classified as income in kind;â–ªThe value of the resulting currency will be determined by market quotes. Such income will be taxed on the usual progressive scale, taking into account tax deductions in the amount of mining expenses;â–ªIncome from the acquisition, sale or other circulation of digital currency will be taxed on a two-stage scale of personal income tax rates (13% in relation to income within 2.4 million rubles and 15% for income exceeding this amount);â–ªThe patent system and regime are not applied to mining and transactions with digital currency self-employed.
